body_html:
This happens because the inception script being run is actually a wrapper that launches the real script in a subprocess.

A workaround is to use the real script directly:

nvprof -o nvprof_bs64_2gpu_3 python bazel-bin/inception/imagenet_train.runfiles/__main__/inception/inception_train.py

body:
This happens because the inception script being run is actually a wrapper that launches the real script in a subprocess.

A workaround is to use the real script directly:

`nvprof -o nvprof_bs64_2gpu_3 python bazel-bin/inception/imagenet_train.runfiles/__main__/inception/inception_train.py`
